name: Inside A Cuckoo Clock
description:
Inside A Cuckoo Clock is a platformer where you have to fly around the constantly moving parts of a cuckoo clock. Although it is similar to flappybird-style games, the bird can move in all directions, rest on a platform and, most importantly, to cuckoo.

Warning: For best experience, please download the windows version below. You might encounter some sound issues (no sound) in the browser version. 

The game was made for the Extra Credits Game Jam #3

Developed by BJNick
Playtested by Alex

Extra Credits (Public Domain Assets):
  • Gears by Freepik.com
  • Cuckoo & Clock Sounds by ScottFerguson1 and FinalCrystine
  • Cuckoo Clock, Breaking Down sound by InspectorJ
  • Whoosh sound by Qubodup
  • Ship bell sound by Acclivity
  • Font Trajanus Roman by Roger White
  • Font BP Mono by Backpacker
  • Font Great Vibes by TypeSETit
  • Abundant Music Composer by Per Nyblom
  • Background by Background Labs シ
